name: Russian Gangster City Combat
description: Are you ready for adventures to play like a top secret agent of Russian secret service in this mafia gangster shootout mission game, taking responsibility to arrest city robbery criminals? The main objective is to plan a jail escape mission & play as a robbers against criminal squad to execute city grand theft. Be the skilled robber and get out from dangerous crime scene. You are a member of gang that involves sniper shooting and assassination of traitors and terrorists by Russian underworld mafia godfather, a hitman, a underworld boss.
